attributes.action: take into account our opposition to the revisions to the Dangerous Wild Animal list as suggested in this petition: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/no-to-pythons/
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Large snakes have not killed anyone in the UK for decades, despite the number of keepers.  We believe that the keepers of large snakes are generally in possesion of more common sense than the thousands of keepers of "cute" dogs that later become responsible for deaths.    Don't penalise reptile-keepers based on our pets being outside the sterotypical definition of "cute"
